title: Ticket #1795: Condor build fork-bombs nmi-v002
description:
I've managed to capture some real info about what's going on on v002... It appears that the machine is being fork-bombed. I see many 'make' processes owned by sl1-user running, and all virtual memory exhausted. It appears that said job was submitted from nmi-s006, I'm doing some more digging.

It's definitely Condor build jobs. The one that was running when it went down last was associated with run 294162, which is a build of tag trunk-2010-11-28.

Looks like it happened again last night, too. Machine went down at 23:13:53, with 3089 processes and Swap: 747012k av, 747012k used, 0k free (all from 'top' which I had running).

I now have a 'watch -n 30 "ps auxww|grep make"' running on this machine in an attempt to help track down what's going on.

-Nick
creator: nleroy
